Roblox.Voice.Api.Models.VoiceSettingsRes.description: Response model for voice settings associated with the user

isVoiceEnabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this user is eligible for voice chat

sessionId.description: Gets or sets unique id of the joined call

Roblox.Voice.Api.Models.JoinVoiceChannel.description: response model for try join voice channel request

channelId.description: Gets or sets unique id of the joined call

Roblox.Voice.Api.Models.JoinVoiceCallReq.description: Request model to join voice call for a chat conversation

callReferenceId.description: Gets or sets unique id of the joined call

type.description: Gets or sets the type of joined call

sessionId.description: Gets or sets unique id of the joined call

Roblox.Voice.Api.Models.VoiceCallLifecyc.description: Request model to start publishing to voice call

channelId.description: Gets or sets unique id of the joined call

sessionId.description: Gets or sets unique id of the joined call

Roblox.Voice.Api.Models.BaseStatusRespon.description: base response model for voice apis

status.description: Gets or sets status of response

Roblox.Voice.Api.Models.PublishInCallReq.description: Request model to start publishing to voice call

offerSdp.description: Gets or sets sdp offer to start publishing

isMuted.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to start as muted or not

channelId.description: Gets or sets unique id of the joined call

sessionId.description: Gets or sets unique id of the joined call

Roblox.Voice.Api.Models.CallUsersListRes.description: Response model for users in voice call

channelId.description: Gets or sets the unique id of the call

ownState.description: Gets or sets the requesting user's state in the channel

publishers.description: Gets or sets the user Id

isMuted.description: Gets or sets if the user is muted

Roblox.Voice.Api.Models.TrickleIceReques.description: Request model for Trickle ICE request for a completing a subscription/peer connection

candidates.description: Gets or sets Web-RTC ICE candidates

isLast.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is the last candidate.
This allows combining the last candidate trickle request with signaling trickle end.

channelId.description: Gets or sets unique id of the joined call

sessionId.description: Gets or sets unique id of the joined call

Roblox.Voice.Api.Models.SubscriptionsReq.description: Request model for user feed subscription operations

subscribedUsers.description: Gets or sets the publisher infos for all users to be subscribed by the subscription request

channelId.description: Gets or sets unique id of the joined call

sessionId.description: Gets or sets unique id of the joined call

Roblox.Voice.Api.Models.CallPublisherInf.description: Request model for a call publisher's details, does not include the publishing state (muted/unmuted)

userId.description: Gets or sets the user Id

feedReferenceId.description:
Gets or sets the unique identifier for a publisher's feed (timestamp user finished publishing handshake)
This is used to identify the latest feed associated with a publisher

Roblox.Voice.Api.Models.BaseSubscription.description: Base Response model for subscription operations

channelId.description: Gets or sets unique id of the joined call

failures.description: Gets or sets the reason, for each publisher the subscription operation failed

Roblox.Voice.Api.Models.CompleteSubscrip.description: Request model to complete subscribing to user feeds in voice call

sdpAnswersList.description: Gets or sets publisher userIds to subscribe to

channelId.description: Gets or sets unique id of the joined call

sessionId.description: Gets or sets unique id of the joined call

Roblox.Voice.Api.Models.CallPublisherSdp.description: Request model for a call publisher's details, does not include the publishing state (muted/unmuted)

publisher.description: Gets or sets the publisher's info

sdp.description: Gets or sets an sdp message representing either an offer from or an answer to the publisher.

subscribedUser.description: Gets or sets the publisher info for the user being subscribed to

candidates.description: Gets or sets Web-RTC ICE candidates

isLast.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is the last candidate.
This allows combining the last candidate trickle request with signaling trickle end.

channelId.description: Gets or sets unique id of the joined call

sessionId.description: Gets or sets unique id of the joined call

Roblox.Voice.Api.Models.CreateGroupRespo.description: The response model for the CreateGroup endpoint

channelIdentifier.description: Gets or sets the channel identifier

Roblox.Voice.Api.Models.BulkCreateGroups.description: Request for creating group channels in bulk

groupIds.description: Gets or sets the group ids to create.

Roblox.Voice.Api.ClientLogRequest.description: Holds a client log message to be stored in the server logs

messages.description: Gets or sets the logs messages.

Roblox.Voice.ClientLogMessage.description: Wraps a single log message from the client

isError.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is a client-side error level log. All other logs will be treated as info level.

message.description: Gets or sets the logs message content.
